sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add reference_cascade_rule="restrict" to awa_eligibility_pool.agent_assignment_rule. This will keep assignment rules from being mistakenly deleted if they are currently in use.</description>
        <name>Block assignment rule delete from pool </name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function () {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'awa_eligibility_pool');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'agent_assignment_rule');
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'reference');
	gr.addNullQuery('reference_cascade_rule');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', 'restrict');
		gr.update();
	}
	return;
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-24 15:26:56</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>07476577739201104a905ee515f6a781</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Block assignment rule delete from pool </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">7f858779db01111086a072c7f496190d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_07476577739201104a905ee515f6a781</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-24 15:26:56</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Block assignment rule delete from pool
